div.p: […] of Hiera Nesos […] Traiana […] (son) of Athenais […] drachmae 1525 […] … Marcus Aurelius […] … for rent … […] 230, drachmae 40 […]enais son of Theon, Aurelios […], dressing room attendants, for rent […] … drachmae 1.5 […] (h2?) … (h1) […] ..25, 1 tetrobol and 1 half-obol […] … of … […] credited […] […] … […] 23 … […] … drachmae 23 … […] … […] drachmae …

Hiera, revenue lands […] Marcus Aurelius on account of the […] 4, drachmae 380 […] Marcus Aurelius […] bouleutes (ex?) gymnasiarch […] the 5th of the month Kaisareios […] Marcus Aurelius […] from the first to the 23rd of the month […] Marcus Aurelius Theophilos, brother […] of Marcus Aurelius […] kosmetes […] also now 12, drachmae 7.. […] total […] Hiera, revenue lands […] for rent of lands […] great […] total of […] money […] Translation: Y. Amory, APF 68 (2022) 141
